Hi Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Name,

The status of your requested item is approved.

please collect it from Service Desk.

 

Thanks,

IT Service Desk.

Hi Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Name,

Your request for Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Request Item has been received.

it will be delivered to you post approval.

 

Thanks,

IT Service Desk.

Hi Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Name,

The status of your requested item is rejected.

 

Thanks,

IT Service Desk.
